  Source   Edit

This module implements the translation of PNode-tree values into VM data and vice-versa.

ser = serialize; des = deserialize

serialize means PNode -> VM-data deserialize means VM-data -> PNode

Imports

../ast/ast_types, ../ast/ast, ../ast/errorhandling, ../ast/lineinfos, ../ast/nimsets, ../ast/types, ../front/msgs, ../utils/idioms, vmaux, vmdef, vmmemory, vmobjects, vmtypegen, vmtypes, ../ast/reports_sem, ../ast/report_enums, ../ast/trees

proc serialize(c: var TCtx; n: PNode; dest: LocHandle; t: PType = nil) {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, Exception, ERecoverableError], tags: [RootEffect].}
Translates the given PNode-tree based data (n) into VM data, storing the result in the location referenced by dest. Required extra memory (string, seq, closures, etc.) is automatically created and populated   Source   Edit 
proc serializeObject(c: var TCtx; dest: LocHandle; constr: PNode; ty: PType): int {.
    ...raises: [Exception, ERecoverableError], tags: [RootEffect].}
Serializes one object-type layer to dest, processing base types via recursion. constr is the nkObjConst expression tree where each successive symbol has a higher position value than the previous one   Source   Edit
